title: Quick & Easy Spicy Miso Ramen Recipe
description:
We're back with another entry in our easy ramen series. This time we're doing a spicy miso ramen with a recipe from cookpad. This thing was great so give it a try.

Original Recipe: https://cookpad.com/recipe/3709118

Spicy Miso Ramen (2 servings)

Ingredients:

Makeshift Miso tare:
100g ground pork
1/2 Tbsp Sesame Oil
1/2 Tsp Grated Garlic
1/2 Tsp Grated Ginger
3 Tbsp Miso Paste
1 Tsp Toubanjan
4 inch piece of Leek (diced)

Soup:
700ml water
1 Tbsp Lee kum kee Chicken powder
1 Tbsp Hon Tsuyu
1/2 Tsp Salt
2 Tsp Sugar
Few drops of La-Yu Chili Oil

Toppings:
Corn
Butter
black pepper
Sesame seeds
Anything else you want

Directions:
1. put all the ingredients for the makeshift tare into a cold pot
2. turn on the heat and mix everything together. cook until pork is cooked through (abount 5-8 minutes)
3. When pork is cooked through and everything is combined, add the ingredients for the soup to the pot.
4. Simmer for 5 minutes and the soup is done.
5. cook your noodles in a separte pot of boiling water. strain noodles well and add them to a bowl.
6. Pour 350ml of your soup over the noodles.
7. Add any toppings you want, but I highly recommend corn and butter.

Follow me on instagram to get some sneak peeks of what I'm working on https://www.instagram.com/wayoframen/
